kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Then the response status code should be 200
kw.sourcename: Then the response status code should be ${status_code}

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Numbers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to real numbers.

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

kw.name: And the response body should not be empty
Should Not Be Empty
kw.doc: Verifies that the given item is not empty.
